review_data.title: Friendly
review_data.content: Stop in for a coffee, cocktail of snack. It is nothing fancy but it was convenient and the people were nice.

review_data.title: Worst Waiters Ever!

review_data.title: Inattentive Staff
review_data.content: We stayed in the St. Gotthard hotel attached to this restaurant and decided to grab a bite here outside because we loved the hotel so much. But the restaurant does not live up to the standards of the hotel. The wait staff is incredibly inattentive...More

review_data.title: A LITTLE DISAPPOINTING
review_data.content: We have choosen a dish from the daily specials, Vitello tonnato with rucola, the 6 small ad thin slices were ok, the sauce tasteless and and it was decorated with 4!! rucola leaves. (the waiter brought as some more rucola after the complaint). My sister...More

review_data.title: Guter Standard
review_data.content: Waren am Samstag Mittag hier zum Essen.Das Essen, ein gemischter Salat war fein,wobei die Salatblätter zu gross waren,Mundgerecht wäre schön...More

review_data.title: Good place for lunch or a dessert with good weather
review_data.content: We had a full lunch with shrimps and steaks. The shrimp was great and the steak was ok. The restaurant is outside and lively. It is not inexpensive

review_data.title: great for lunch
review_data.content: centrally located, broad menue, good quality italian food - try the risotto w gamberini or the spaghetti carbonara, you will like it
